title: FortiCloud Cross Site Script Persistent Web Vulnerabilities
summary: Forticloud online service before May 3, 2016 was exposed to cross site scripting web vulnerabilities, which could allow malicious script being injected in the affected module; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
description: Forticloud online service before May 3, 2016 was exposed to cross site scripting web vulnerabilities, which could allow malicious script being injected in the affected module; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
